feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: A League of Their Own - Season 2 Episode 27

link.title: A League of Their Own - Season 2 Episode 27

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Penny Marshall’s A League of Their Own, and the 1993 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is hung up on LEAF Phoenix, Chris is fuming over both the end credits and Argylle, and they both commiserate over their failed little league careers.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Silence - Season 2 Episode 26
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Martin Scorsese’s Silence, and the 2017 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline could’ve gone to school with everyone’s favorite nepo baby and Chris gets blindsided by a Princess Bride reference.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Contagion - Season 2 Episode 25
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Steven Soderbergh’s Contagion, and the 2012 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline and Chris both have LOTS of thoughts on Albert Nobbs. They also break down the current state of the Oscar race!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Before Sunrise - Season 2 Episode 24
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Richard Linklater’s Before Sunrise, and the 1996 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is really not a fan of Ethan Hawke’s facial hair, and Chris really is a fan of Julie Delpy.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Babylon - Season 2 Episode 23
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts are joined by Josh Wahl to discuss Damien Chazelle’s Babylon, and the 2023 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline likes them a little seasoned, Chris learns that he actually DOES know about scores and if it’s Friday, Josh is watching Sorkin.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Fight Club - Season 2 Episode 22
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss David Fincher’s Fight Club, and the 1999 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is ready to get tatted up, and Chris makes psychosis seem cute.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: The King of Comedy - Season 2 Episode 21

link.title: The King of Comedy - Season 2 Episode 21

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Martin Scorsese’s The King of Comedy, and the 1983 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline aspires to be like Coppola’s editor, and Chris and Marty have teamed up to save American Cinema.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Nope - Season 2 Episode 20
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts are joined by Surina Belk-Gupta to discuss Jordan Peele’s Nope, and the 2023 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline loves the Big Bang Theory, Chris finally can talk about how much he doesn’t care about Avatar, and Surina loves bad horror sequels.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast

entry.title: Shaun of the Dead - Season 2 Episode 19

link.title: Shaun of the Dead - Season 2 Episode 19

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts are joined by Gavin Berger to discuss Edgar Wright’s Shaun of the Dead, and the 2005 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is anti-Bechdel test, Chris loves Downton Abbey, and Gavin has actually never seen a single movie.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Inside Man - Season 2 Episode 18
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Spike Lee’s Inside Man, and the 2007 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline thinks she could’ve solved this heist better than Denzel Washington, and Chris learns a fun way to remember how to pronounce “Cillian Murphy”.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
